item.title: Pixelgraph
item.description: One of the reasons I wanted to start this blog was to have a place I felt comfortable sharing the various smaller projects I like to bash out over a weekend or two. So, it feels only fitting that the first post I make should be about one of those projects!

item.title: Michael's Poop Horse
item.description: “I have a game idea,” Michael said.

item.title: Sonic X Reebok
item.description: This post is dedicated to the Sonic x Reebok shoes I recieved for my birthday. They're the Knuckles edition shoes and dang, they look so good! I've never put on a pair of shoes and thought "Damn, these are cool", but I'm a changed man now.

item.title: Pancakes
item.description: It’s cold, so I’ve been busting out the pancakes, the English crepe-y kind. A little lemon juice, sugar and cinnamon, in whatever combo/quantity is getting me through these chilly mornings!

item.title: Fatal Fury's Unapproachable Beta
item.description: If you keep up with fighting games at all, you probably knew about the Fatal Fury: City of the Wolves beta that finished up last weekend. I’ve been excited for this one, having only ever dabbled with King of Fighters, Garou: Mark of the Wolves is easily my favourite of SNK’s fighters. A full-on sequel twenty-six years later is pretty wild.

item.title: Clicking Watch
item.description: Here’s a small thing I made all the way back in November, 2022. It's sat privately on my itch page this entire time. Todays the day I finally unleash the Clicking Watch!
